SEARCH
Package sustech.cs304.AIDE.controller

Class AnnounceController

java.lang.Object
sustech.cs304.AIDE.controller.AnnounceController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/announce") public class AnnounceController extends Object
Controller for handling announcements related to courses. This class provides endpoints for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting announcements.

  • Method Details

    • createAnnounce

      @PostMapping(value="/createAnnounce", produces="application/json") @Transactional public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Boolean> createAnnounce(@RequestParam String courseId, @RequestParam String announceName, @RequestParam String announceContent, @RequestParam String userId)
      Creates a new announcement.
      Parameters:
      courseId - the ID of the course
      announceName - the name of the announcement
      announceContent - the content of the announcement
      userId - the ID of the user creating the announcement
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating success or failure

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the announcement
      userId - the ID of the user requesting the deletion

      a ResponseEntity indicating success or failure
